metadata.title: CVE-2020-36649 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in mholt PapaParse up to 5.1.x. It has beenclassified as problematic. Affected is an unknown function of the filepapaparse.js. The manipulation leads to inefficient regular expressioncomplexity. Upgrading to version 5.2.0 is able to address this issue. Thename of the patch is 235a12758cd77266d2e98fd715f53536b34ad621. It isrecommended to upgrade the affected component. The identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-218004.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
